text:
if you assign a appender to a category other than root in a propertiesfile, but
later assign another appender in another propertiesfile to the same category,
this error message comes out

log4j:ERROR Attempted to append to closed appender named [A1].
log4j:WARN Not allowed to write to a closed appender.

but if a new appender is only added to the existing one, this should work.

1. properties file

log4j.rootCategory=DEBUG, A1,R
log4j.category.log4jtest$B=DEBUG , A1,R
...

2. properties file
log4j.category.log4jtest$B=DEBUG, T

This is a well known issue. This happends of the same appender is attached to 
multiple categories and then one of those categories is reconfigured which 
causes the attached appender to be closed. 

Is this a real issue for you in a real deployed system?
